detectors.description: List of detector names: yolo, face, plate. Order matters for sequential mode.

execution_mode.description: How detectors are run. Only 'sequential' is supported (chains YOLO  Face  Plate).

motion_cooldown_seconds.description: Seconds to wait after motion ends before stopping detection

motion_sensitivity.description: Lower values = more sensitive. Used in motion_triggered and hybrid modes.

known_face_color.description: Color for known/recognized faces in hex format (e.g., '#00FF00')
known_face_color.example: Sed et iste expedita tenetur nostrum.

unknown_face_color.description: Color for unknown faces in hex format (e.g., '#FF0000')
unknown_face_color.example: Molestias minus commodi minus aut minus harum.

detecting_cameras.description: Number of cameras currently running detection

pipeline_detection_enabled.description: Whether AI detection is enabled (false when mode=disabled)

pipeline_mode.description: Current pipeline detection mode (disabled, continuous, motion_triggered, scheduled, hybrid)

tasks.description: List of YOLO11 tasks. 'detect' for object detection, 'pose' for human pose estimation, 'segment' for instance segmentation, 'obb' for oriented bounding boxes, 'classify' for image classification.
